heading: HR01963
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE FOR OUR FISHERMEN BETTER FISHING VESSELS AND EQUIPMENT FOLLOWING THE RECENT HARASSMENT INCIDENT IN SCARBOROUGH SHOAL IN ORDER TO PROVIDE FOR OUR FISHERMEN THE MEANS ON WHICH TO WITHSTAND SUCH HARASSMENTS AND TO IMPROVE THE CONDUCT OF THEIR FISHING ACTIVITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01963
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE FOR OUR FISHERMEN BETTER FISHING VESSELS AND EQUIPMENT FOLLOWING THE RECENT HARASSMENT INCIDENT IN SCARBOROUGH SHOAL IN ORDER TO PROVIDE FOR OUR FISHERMEN THE MEANS ON WHICH TO WITHSTAND SUCH HARASSMENTS AND TO IMPROVE THE CONDUCT OF THEIR FISHING ACTIVITIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-20
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2018-08-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-07-30
